enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Issues relating to cleaner or less-greenhouse gas-emitting energy: This issue was addressed in SBSTA Plenary on Wednesday, 3 December.

Delegates disagreed on whether SBSTA should invite Parties to submit views on the issue, and Chair Thorgeirsson said he would consult informally on the matter. In the SBSTA Plenary, on Tuesday, 9 December, Chair Thorgeirsson noted that no consensus had been reached on the issue.
Canada expressed hope that progress would be made in the future.
SBSTA adopted the conclusions, which note that no progress was made.
